title: Canadiens fire goalie coach Raymond
desc: The Montreal Canadiens announced on Wednesday that the team has relieved goalie coach Eric Raymond of his duties.

title: Kieron Bowie: Hibernian striker coveted by Serie A club Verona
desc: Hellas Verona are keen on Kieron Bowie - so will the Hibernian striker be the next Scot to shine in Serie A?

title: US Tech Stocks To Watch After Nasdaq 100 Bullish Breakout Above 25830 (Technical Analysis)
desc: Amazon, Cisco & Meta show improving volatility-adjusted relative strength versus their benchmarks, suggesting a transition from prior underperformance to potential positive alpha generation.

title: Arc Raiders and The Finals hit by "coordinated" DDoS attacks
desc: Embark Studios confirms that both Arc Raiders and The Finals have been hit by DDoS attacks.

title: The womanosphere urges dubious followers to back ICE: ‘Don’t let compassion cloud you’
desc: Conservative figures such as Riley Gaines and Allie Beth Stuckey are urging their followers to ward off empathy for victims of ICE’s crackdown

title: Thailand Masters 2026 badminton: Mithun Manjunath stuns eighth seed to set up showdown with Olympic medallist Lee Zii Jia
desc: Mithun Manjunath, Kiran George and Anmol Kharb won their respective first-round matches at the Thailand Masters 2026 badminton. Get Day 2 results.

title: IDF, Israel Police disperse clashes in West Bank
desc: An Israeli civilian and three Palestinians were wounded and evacuated for medical treatment, the military said.

title: Gold rates today: MCX gold rises ₹7,200 per 10g, silver jumps ₹26,800 per kg as US dollar hovers near four-year low
desc: Gold and silver prices surged on 28 January, driven by a drop in the US Dollar Index. February gold futures hit ₹1,64,900, while silver March futures reached ₹3,83,100, reflecting gains of 21% and 62%, respectively, this month amid low interest rate speculation.

title: 'Bring them home' answered at last as Israel buries final hostage
desc: Many people who turned out to Ran Gvili's funeral hope this will allow the country to start to move forward and heal.
